price: But if the right is in their favor, they come to him in full submission[29].
arabic: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ يَأۡتُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مُذۡعِنِينَ
footnotes: [29] For they care for their own interests and desires, not submission to the right judgment.
